name: NewYork60.com
tag_list: new-york, broadway, shows, tickets, attractions, tours, buy, discount, nueva-york, comprar, entradas, musicales, espectaculos, places, comedies-musicales, obras-de-teatro, karten, bigletter, biglietti
overview:
NewYork60.com is a American company that offers online access to Broadway shows and other New York City entertainment. One of few ticketsellers that operates in languages other than english (11 languages total), the company has carved a niche for itself in an industry otherwise dominated by Ticketmaster and Telecharge.

Using a “best seats” model, newyork60.com offers prices frequently lower than other ticketsellers, and maintains an open return policy until 10 days before shows/events. An authorized site (as opposed to a broker or dealer), the company is also able to work directly with venues for seating and other issues.

NewYork60.com is a woman-owned business, founded in 2006, and has achieved an A Better Business Bureau rating.
